about.content: 1. <hl>Self-produced</hl> semiconductors  2. Production and Sales of <hl>H</hl>igh-<hl>P</hl>erformance <hl>S</hl>ervers with self-manufactured semiconductors  3. Construction of operative <hl>Blockchain IDC</hl> based on high-performance servers  4. Establish solution relating to Blockchain <hl>(IPFS)</hl>

hero.description1: Maxius is the only self-developed semiconductor company that focuses on developing High-Performance Servers. We provide specialized solutions tailored towards different sectors of the IT industry and strive to break into the global market as a leader in server technology.
hero.description2: Together, we will be the best in value and speed.
hero.title: MAX I & US
